General.Name: Silla Textile Co.Ltd
General.Description: Silla Textile Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture and export of synthetic fibers and textiles. It sells its products under the crown brand name. Silla Textile Co., Ltd. was founded in 1976 and is based in Daegu, South Korea.

0.Name: Jae-Heung  Park
0.Title: Sr. Managing Director and Representative Director
